snippet: Jorge Eduardo Costilla Sánchez, known as El Coss, was arrested Wednesday afternoon, the Mexican Navy said in a statement.
abstract: Jorge Eduardo Costilla Sanchez, head of one of Mexico's largest drug cartels, and wanted by the United States since 2002, is captured by the Mexican Navy.
lead_paragraph: Jorge Eduardo Costilla Sánchez, known as El Coss, was arrested Wednesday afternoon, the Mexican Navy said in a statement.

headline.seo: Mexico Captures El Coss, Head of Gulf Cartel
headline.main: Mexico Announces Capture of Gulf Cartel’s Top Leader
headline.print_headline: Mexico Announces Capture of Gulf Cartel’s Top Leader
